Lotto Powerball draw: Jackpot rolls over to $33 million, pair share $1m https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/lotto-powerball-draw-numbers-drawn-for-30-million-jackpot-tonight/3F3MFF37LRD55PHPZM2SDCWELE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/lotto-powerball-draw-numbers-drawn-for-30-million-jackpot-tonight/3F3MFF37LRD55PHPZM2SDCWELE/ Raphael FranksIf won by one ticket, it would be the second-largest prize this year. Wed, 31 Jul 2024 09:46:05 +0000 Ticket sales close at 7.30pm and the winning numbers will be drawn at 8.20pm. The Herald will publish the winning numbers as they are drawn. Photo / Michael Bradley.

Wed, 31 Jul 2024 07:47:51 +0000 Adrian Clancy is facing a retrial, charged with murdering 17-month-old Sadie-Leigh Gardner in 2019.

Philip Polkinghorne murder trial: Detectives questioned over how suicide call-out morphed to murder investigation https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/philip-polkinghorne-murder-Trial-Detectives-questioned-over-how-suicide-callout-morphed-to-murder-investigation/VZ3KYQKCEFGALCAAPIAH5CRPIA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/philip-polkinghorne-murder-Trial-Detectives-questioned-over-how-suicide-callout-morphed-to-murder-investigation/VZ3KYQKCEFGALCAAPIAH5CRPIA/ Craig KapitanThe Auckland eye surgeon is accused of having strangled his wife in their Remuera home. He is accused of strangling wife Pauline Hanna and staging her death as a suicide. Photo / Michael Craig
